"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d1aaf1636872390a230200#post_54d1aaf1636872390a230200
[bq="trashboat"]"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d1aa8a63687219347d0200#post_54d1aa8a63687219347d0200
Despite the Excessive fanservice,[/bq]
Gonna have to stop ya right there, if there's any fanservice in any anime I won't be able to get into it no matter how good it is besides that.

I've seen a couple scenes of Kill La Kill, and while it is pretty funny and beautifully animated, I can't stand the fanservice in it.

topics.body:
So... WataMote. Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui. It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular. I know precious little about this series, but I have to admit that it caught my eye. So for anyone who's seen it, I need to ask: how is it?

[spoiler]Also, it has a dub? I had no idea. I'll probably watch the subbed version first, though.[/spoiler]
